attributes.action: Grant independence to the micronation of Pete and Tom's Really Good Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime minister Tony Blair to allow the realization and independence of the recently unified 'Pete and Tom's Really Good Country'

Contact Information - E-mail: a_little_less_sixteen_candles@hotmail.com

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
